title: Open Call for Maria Moors Cabot Prizes
desc: Deadline: 12-Mar-2026 The Maria Moors Cabot Prizes honor journalists and news organizations whose sustained, courageous reporting has strengthened Inter-American understanding and defended press freedom across the Western Hemisphere.
